property.name: AlternateBlockMaterial
property.summary: Gets or sets the alternate Material used when bashing or blocking (shields only).

property.name: ArmorRating
property.summary: Gets or sets the armor rating of this Armor.

property.name: BlockImpactDataSet
property.summary: Gets or sets the shield bash Impact Data Set (shields only).

property.name: BodyNodes
property.summary: Gets or sets the used to determine which body parts this Armor will use.

property.name: Description
property.summary: Gets or sets the description of this Armor that will override the enchantment description if provided.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: Enchantment
property.summary: Gets or sets the Enchantment of this Armor.

property.name: EquipType
property.summary: Gets or sets the shield Equip Type (shields only).

property.name: FemaleWorldModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the world model (.nif file) that will be used for this Armor when the player character is a female.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: FullName
property.summary: Gets or sets the in-game name of this Armor.

property.name: IsPlayable
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Armor can be worn by the player character.

property.name: IsShield
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this item is a shield.

property.name: Keywords
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Keywords associated with this Armor.

property.name: MaleWorldModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the world model (.nif file) that will be used for this Armor when the player character is a male.

property.name: Models
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Armor Addons used by this Armor.

property.name: ObjectBounds
property.summary: Gets or sets the of this Armor.

property.name: PickUpSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Armor is picked up.

property.name: PutDownSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Armor is put down.

property.name: Race
property.summary: Gets or sets the Race that is allowed to wear this Armor.

property.name: Scripts
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Scripts attached to this Armor.

property.name: Skill
property.summary: Gets or sets the Skill that will be used when this Armor is worn.

property.name: TemplateArmor
property.summary: Gets or sets the Armor that will be used as the template.

property.name: Value
property.summary: Gets or sets the value of this Armor.

property.name: Weight
property.summary: Gets or sets the weight of this Armor.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.

remarks.p: Property Skill can be assigned values Skills.LightArmor, Skills.HeavyArmor and Skills.None only. If no value is assigned the value will default to Skills.LightArmor for any newly created Armor forms.
Property BodyNodes can be assigned a set of values combined with | operator. To determine whether a specific body node has been set (in a if statement or a where clause) method HasFlag() can be used.
